body: An aasimar with this racial trait gains spell resistance equal to 5 + her level against spells and spell-like abilities with the evil descriptor, as well as any spells and spell-like abilities cast by evil outsiders. This racial trait replaces celestial resistance.
name: Exalted Resistance
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Aasimars/Alternate Racial Traits/Exalted Resistance
